mapper.insert: insert into connect (ConnectID, ConnectStart, ConnectMiddle, ConnectTerminus, ConnectType, ConnectDate, ConnectNotes) values (#{connectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connectstart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connectmiddle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connectterminus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connecttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{connectdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{connectnotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update connect set ConnectStart = #{connectstart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ConnectMiddle = #{connectmiddle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ConnectTerminus = #{connectterminus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ConnectType = #{connecttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ConnectDate = #{connectdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ConnectNotes = #{connectnotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ConnectID = #{connectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ConnectID, ConnectStart, ConnectMiddle, ConnectTerminus, ConnectType, ConnectDate, ConnectNotes from connect where ConnectID = #{connectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ConnectID, ConnectStart, ConnectMiddle, ConnectTerminus, ConnectType, ConnectDate, ConnectNotes from connect
